item.title: Responsibilities of the Intro COS Lab Interviewers
item.description: Prior to interviews: Familiarize yourself with the debugging question. Claim interview time slots. During interviews: Introduce yourself. This includes name, year, major, and involvement with the IntroLab. Verify eligibility. Please confirm the position that the interview is for and whether the candidate meets the basic criteria to continue. (Ex: Completed COS 226 + 217 for 2xx Lab TA position) Brief summary of role. Explain that the purpose of Lab TAs is to help debug and teach students how to debug, NOT explain how to approach assignment or give conceptual explanations.
